标题: [1.10.2][MoreEdibles——更多食物][已汉化]我也不说什么了 本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-8-2 23:42 编辑 

前言：
好久没有发MOD了......也好久没有发帖子了......



简介：
看题目就知道，增加了更多食物。也增加了一个不是食物的东西，黄油刀。你不能在探索中找到这些食物。

关于汉化：

作者原文：
This mod adds more foods to your minecraft. Most foods are edible some are for crafting other food. Only one item that is not a food is added, a butter knife. All foods are crafted, you cant find them by exploring.

Crafting recipes:
Blaze powder and a glass bottle to make an energy drink.
Butter knife and bread to make slices of bread.
Cooking slices of bread will give you toast.
2 uncooked porkchops will give you bacon.
Cooking bacon gives you cooked bacon.
Cooking sugar gives you caramel, or carmel?
An apple + caramel/carmel gives you a carmel/caramel apple.
A few iron bars gets you a butter knife.
做一个模组介绍可以不呢
